title: 5G Roaming

title: Seamlessly Core Evolution
description: 'One Core' for multi-accesses can operate as a 4G EPC, 5G NSA and/or 5G SA, thus allowing for smooth migration from existing network capabilities.

title: Voice-enabled Networks
description: VoLTE/VoNR is available in LTE/5G networks, and if LTE and VoLTE are already widely deployed, introduction of VoNR can be made smoothly.
